title: Application For Divorce - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Amnesia   Brother Complex   Clumsy Love Interests   Cold Love Interests   Divorce   Doting Older Siblings   F*llatio   Forced into a Relationship   Forced Marriage   Futuristic Setting   Generals   Handsome Male Lead   Insects   Misunderstandings   Mpreg   Multiple Personalities   Outer Space   Personality Changes   Popular Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Proactive Protagonist   Protagonist Falls in Love First   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   R*pe   Strong Love Interests   Wealthy Characters
author: As Distant As The White Clouds   远上白云间
description:
Seven years ago, Cheng Jin had forced and oppressed Lu Tao to marry him. 

After suffering from the other’s cold treatment, being hated after the marriage and experienced being broke, he finally decided to let go.

His husband, yet, unexpectedly lost his memory and fell in love with him. 

Cheng Jin not only was delighted, but felt unrivalled agony, because he knew that this love had an “expiration date”.>
